text: The 1978–79 season was the 33rd season of competitive football played by NK Dinamo Zagreb since the foundation of the Yugoslav First League. ==First Federal League== ===Matches=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- !width="100"|Date !width="130"|Opponents !width="70"|Home / Away !width="70"|Result (F -
